title: Dawn Bringer Riven Visual Bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
There's a visual bug on her blue ribbons that causes the inkwell to disappear towards the end. When I walk/turn around/ect. you can see a box where the inkwell stops and will go no further. 
Was this intentional? For a "LEGENDARY" skin?
Could you please Hot Fix this? It is VERY distracting and annoying. If this is intentional, i demand (nicely) for a refund or a fix ASAP.

Link is Pictures for proof

replies.body:
Hiya!

Unfortunately, this is a side effect of character inking, a system we don't have a ton of control over. In order to "resolve" this issue (it's more of a workaround), you'd need to turn off character inking in your video settings. 

To show you what it looks like with v. without:

http://imgur.com/m4Rd3YG
